sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Heraclitus ridens redivivus; or, a dialogue between Harry and Roger, concerning the times Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.
8 p.
s.n., [Oxford : printed in the year, 1688]
By Thomas Brown. An imaginary satirical dialogue between Henry Care and Roger L'Estrange. Caption title. This edition has a semicolon after "Redivivus". Another edition has a colon. Printed in double columns. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
